Story.title: The Story of In Herbis Veritas
Story.intro: Dive into the heart of our adventure, where the passion for medicinal plants took root to become a quest for authentic and shared well-being.
Story.paragraph1_text: It all began with a deep fascination for the healing power of nature, an insatiable curiosity for the ancestral knowledge of herbalists, and a desire to reconnect with our environment in a simpler, truer way.
Story.paragraph2_text: We've walked forgotten paths, met passionate growers, and learned to cultivate our own gardens in harmony with natural cycles. Each plant is chosen for its vitality, each blend designed to harmonize body and mind.
Story.paragraph3_text: In Herbis Veritas is more than a brand; it's a community of enthusiasts, plant explorers, united by the belief that nature holds the keys to a healthier, more fulfilling life. Join us on this sensory and healing journey.
Story.imageAlt: An inspiring image representing the spirit of In Herbis Veritas, perhaps a lush garden or a collection of dried plants.

authenticity.title: Pure Authenticity
authenticity.description: Each plant is hand-picked, each preparation a secret of nature passed down with love. We believe in the raw strength of the plant, without artifice.

quality.title: Exacting Quality
quality.description: From seed to herbal tea, we watch over every detail. Our ancestral methods guarantee living products, rich with the earth's benefits.

respect.title: Respect for Life
respect.description: Nature is our ally; we cherish it. Our cultivation respects the cycles, our harvests are gentle, for a sustainable balance between humans and plants.
